message: Hello Bob! I have a fantastic product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $180.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product, but I was hoping to stay within a budget of $150. Would it be possible to negotiate down to that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I'm willing to work with you. How about $165?  This is still a great price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Could we possibly bring the price down to $155? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
